title: Strictly's Anneka Rice reveals horrific bruises after gruelling rehearsal with Kevin Clifton

Strictly Come Dancing isn't all glitter and glam - there's a price to pay for all that glitz.

And Anneka Rice has found that out the hard way as she showed off her horrific bruising after a week's worth of gruelling rehearsals with Kevin Clifton.

The TV presenter took to Instagram to bemoan her fragile self as she revealed she'd been through the wringer this week.

"Oh my goodness, the level of bruising on my body," she gasped.

(Image: Instagram)

"I've just had a wardrobe fitting for this week and everyone's gone, 'What's happened?'"

Pulling up her top to reveal a particularly nasty-looking bruise on her stomach, Anneka went on: "I'll show you what I mean: this is just one at the front of my body.

"There's bruises in places I barely knew I had places," she joked.

(Image: Instagram)

"Kevin... what have you done to me?"

She and professional partner Kev - who won the show last year with now-girlfriend Stacey Dooley - will sweep the floor this weekend with the Charleston, which they'll perform to Woo Hoo by The 5.6.7.8's from the film Kill Bill.

This Saturday marks Movie Week - and Anneka and Kevin will be hoping to score higher than their disappointing 19/40 for last weekend's waltz.

But Kevin isn't holding out much hope, after branding his partner "completely useless".

Speaking on The Kevin Clifton Show podcast, the dancer said: "She told me when she was about six she went to a ballet class but got thrown out of the ballet class because she was completely useless.

(Image: BBC/Kieron McCarron)

"And she was told she's never going to be good enough, she's too stiff and all the rest of it," he went on.

"So, it's always been one of those things for her, her whole life, she’s said she likes watching dance and loves painting dancers and all that kind of stuff.

"She's really into dance but never felt she could do it because of what happened when she was a kid," he added.

*Strictly Come Dancing returns tomorrow night at 7.10pm on BBC1
description: Strictly Come Dancing star Anneka Rice winced as she showed her nasty injuries ahead of tomorrow night's show
